briefTitle: Girls OnGuard: HPV Vaccination Uptake Among African American Adolescent Females

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* African American
* Female
* Age 13-18 years
* Seeking reproductive/STI services at participating clinic
* Ability to give written informed consent or assent

Exclusion Criteria:

* Pregnant
* Married
* Already received the HPV vaccine

outcomeMeasures.title: GARDASIL Vaccination Uptake and Compliance With Second and Third Doses
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of participants who received at least 1 dose, 2 doses, 3 doses

outcomeMeasures.title: STD Incidence
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of participants who tested positive for any STD 7 months post randomization, information was gathered via medical chart abstraction

outcomeMeasures.title: Total Doses Received of HPV Vaccine
outcomeMeasures.description: As an additional primary outcome, we assessed the total number of vaccine doses received
